definition: gear/brake/sluice/lock (on waterway)/electric switch or circuit breaker
old variant of 閘|闸[zha2]/sluice/lock (on waterway)

sentences.english: Behindher, the first gate closed, trapping them like a ship in a lock.
sentences.chinese: 第一个门缓缓地合上了，就像一道闭合的船闸。

sentences.english: The Wan-An Lock is a huge single-step ship lock with the highest water head in our country.
sentences.chinese: 万安船闸是国内目前兴建的最高水头的单级大型船闸。

sentences.english: The Wan-An Lock is a huge single-step ship lock with the highest water head in our country.
sentences.chinese: 万安船闸是国内目前兴建的最高水头的单级大型船闸。

sentences.english: The arranging of three-gorges permanent lock chamber is a multi-objective planning problem.
sentences.chinese: 三峡永久船闸的编排问题是一个多目标规划问题。

sentences.english: They would be built alongside existing 600-foot locks.
sentences.chinese: 新船闸将沿着原有的600英尺船闸修建。

sentences.english: They would be built alongside existing 600-foot locks.
sentences.chinese: 新船闸将沿着原有的600英尺船闸修建。

sentences.english: Ship makes fast to lock on port side before gate closed.
sentences.chinese: 在闸门关闭前左舷靠妥船闸。

sentences.english: Engineers could not make the new locks too big.
sentences.chinese: 工程师不能把新船闸建得太大。

sentences.english: At present, Three Gorges five-level ship lock is the largest navigation facility in the world.
sentences.chinese: 三峡五级船闸是目前世界上规模最大的通航设施。

sentences.english: The existing locks are three hundred five meters long and thirty-three meters wide.
The ship lock ranks Grade III and has the navigation standard of four kiloton ship in one uplifting.
sentences.chinese: 船闸为Ⅲ级，通航标准为一顶四艘千吨级。

sentences.english: At present, the high slope and the navigation lock is in a stable state.
sentences.chinese: 目前高边坡和船闸处于稳定状态。

sentences.english: All the locks are controlled by engineers from the navigation control room.
sentences.chinese: 所有船闸都有通航调度室的工程师控制。

sentences.english: The Yinpan lock in Wujiang River is presently the highest single level lock in China.
sentences.chinese: 乌江银盘船闸为目前国内单级最高水头船闸。

sentences.english: The Yinpan lock in Wujiang River is presently the highest single level lock in China.
sentences.chinese: 乌江银盘船闸为目前国内单级最高水头船闸。
编队8号船必须在船闸停船处待命。

definition: the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
